title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  A covered canoe", 1853 or 1857
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457e; and again at lower right:  Lugt 457d
description: Horizontal sheet containing a covered canoe with a seated woman cooking in the bow as two men row beside her, a third man standing on the hip-roof and poling the water, and a fourth man, wearing a hat and poncho, standing in the helm.  Scratchings at lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Study.  A covered canoe", 1853 or 1857.
1853 or 1857. Graphite on gray paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1343.
